name: Parker Pfaff

experience.title: Undergraduate Teaching Assistant
experience.description: Responsible for attending lectures, hosting office hours, assisting students with programming assignments, and grading

experience.title: React-Native Developer
experience.description: Mobile application startup for creating and locating events around you. Startup qualified for the RAMP accelerator program in Roanoke Virginia.

projects.title: EduSmart
projects.description: Created software that is currently licensed and used across 12 Centra Health special education schools in central Virginia to track and graph student behavioral data. This software has saved the Program Manager of Rivermont schools extensive time and resources every year having to manually create spreadsheets to manage the data.

bio: My name is Parker Pfaff and I am currently a Junior in Computer Science at Virginia Tech. I am very interested in mobile and web development, and I am constantly pursuing my entreprenurial projects. I am currently seeking a summer internship in Software Development
